name: Constantly Jumping Up Mountains - Beta v1.1
name_original: Constantly Jumping Up Mountains - Beta v1.1
description:
Constantly Jumping Up Mountains - Beta v1.1 is a platformer game developed by Shaneguy. It was originally released in 2014.
Constantly Jumping Up Mountains - Beta v1.1 is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
